pages.title: Silkworms larvae
pages.text: Silkworms live on Mulberry, Fig and Breadfruit trees.Their leaves can drop silkworms larvae with a small chance when destroyed.

pages.title: Wicker Tray
pages.text: Wicker tray is a place, where silkworms will be making their silk.

pages.title: Process of Sericulture
pages.text: Place the Wicker tray on the ground.Click with leaves(silkworms prefer Mulberry,Breadfruit or Fig empty leaves) to place them inside.Then click on it with silkworms larvae.After a while they'll begin to pupate.Place Bunch Of Branches inside.Then wait until the worms produce cocoons.Click on the tray to get silk cocoons.
Now you need to wash the cocoons in the hot water.Use a vanilla minecraft Cauldron with water: click on it with a Cocoon to get Silk Fiber.

pages.title: Silk Fiber
pages.text: Silk fiber is a raw silk material you get from silkworms cocoons.You'll need to spin it with the Spinning Wheel in order to get real Silk Yarn.
